description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/organizations/resolve-a-short-id/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/organizations/resolve-a-short-id/)

This resolves a short ID to the project slug and internal issue ID.

### Path Parameters

`organization_slug` *(string)*REQUIRED

The slug of the organization the short ID should be looked up in.

`short_id` *(string)*REQUIRED

The short ID to look up.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `org: read`
